goal.ch: 組織的核心價值需要管理者善用財務資源才能貢獻社會，本課程旨在培育管理學院的學生學習及應用組織的各項會計資訊進行管理決策。
goal.en: The core value of all business organizations can contribute to the society and it requires managers to conquer the challenges of scarcity of financial resources. The major goal of this course is to acquaint students in Management Schools with the fundamental tools of managerial accounting and to promote their understanding of the dramatic ways in which business is changing.  Most of all, it is very important for students to experience the top managers’ view about organizational financial resource decisions.  To achieve this goal, the fundamental roles of managerial accounting in organizations and various dramatic alternatives in which managers are dealing in real world these days are designed in this course plan.  The tentative schedule for this course will not only cover methods to gather accounting information for managers and expectation from managers to use, but also considerations to react to the managerial accounting information in various situations. In addition to lectures and group presentation, learning project and case discussion will be included in the course to enhance the learning performance of all students. Students are expected to participate and involve in the learning processes actively to improve the learning effectiveness.
